snippet: Senator Mitch McConnell of Kentucky, the majority leader, said Tuesday that he expected to bring the nomination of Loretta E. Lynch to be attorney general to the Senate floor for a vote next week.
abstract: Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell says he expects to bring nomination of Loretta E Lynch for attorney general to Senate floor for vote imminently.
lead_paragraph: Senator Mitch McConnell of Kentucky, the majority leader, said Tuesday that he expected to bring the nomination of Loretta E. Lynch to be attorney general to the Senate floor for a vote next week.

headline.main: Senate Vote Expected Next Week on Attorney General Nominee
headline.print_headline: Senate Vote Expected Next Week on Attorney General Nominee
